mapper.sql: ID, YEARMON, ORG_CODE, PTGZ, PSGZ, PEGZ, PBGZ, CVMGZ, ZHNL, FBPM, ZTPM
mapper.select:
select
from hty_fct_org_value where ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} order by YEARMON desc limit 1

select u.rowNo from ( select t.ORG_CODE,t.PTGZ,t.YEARMON,(@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) as rowNo from ( select ORG_CODE,PTGZ,YEARMON from hty_fct_org_value where YEARMON = #{yearmon} and ORG_CODE in (SELECT c.ORG_CODE from DCI_DIM_ORG c where c.ORG_PCODE = (SELECT d.ORG_PCODE from DCI_DIM_ORG d where d.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode})) order by hty_fct_org_value.PTGZ desc ) t,(select (@rowNum :=0) ) b ) u where u.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}
select Max(ZHNL) as ZHNL,Max(PBGZ) as PBGZ,Max(PSGZ) as PSGZ,Max(PEGZ) as PEGZ,Max(CVMGZ) as CVMGZ from hty_fct_org_value where YEARMON = #{yearmon}
